name: Mezco Spice Blend, Sweet and Smoky, Meal Prep Seasoning, 2.4 oz
short_description: FLAVOR FORWARD: A lively flavor combination of ancho pepper, smoked paprika, and dried pineapple; Brings a kick of Mexican style flavor with smoky mild chiles and hints of sweet pineapple to appetizers, entrees, and side dishes
ELEVATES THE EVERYDAY: Use it to season meat, seafood, or rice and beans; Try it on vegetables to bring the zing
QUICK AND EASY: Inspired by the regional flavors of Mexico and the energy of Mexico City, Mezco meal shortcuts are designed to give you all the flavor, none of the frills
ENDLESS INSPIRATION: Perfect for exploring exciting tastes for your family table, expressing yourself through flavorful creations, or adding your own unique spin to dishes
CONTAINS: One 2.4 oz bottle of Mezco Sweet and Smoky Spice Blend
product_description: Get creative in the kitchen with Mezco Sweet and Smoky Spice Blend. Shake or sprinkle it onto foods to bring a kick of Mexican style flavor with smoky mild chiles and hint of sweet pineapple. Enjoy the lively flavor combination of ancho pepper, smoked paprika, and dried pineapple. Make it your go-to seasoning for meat such as pork, chicken, or seafood. Add the balance of sweet and smoky flavor to vegetable dishes. Reach for Mezco spices to add an extra zing to rice and beans. Inspired by the regional flavors of Mexico and the energy of Mexico City, Mezco meal shortcuts are designed to give you all the flavor your curious tastebuds could want. Whether you crave exploring exciting tastes for your family table, expressing yourself through flavor-forward creations, or just like adding your own unique spin to foods, every meal can be a taste adventure with Mezco spice blends.

name: Clean Monday Meals BBQ Bundle | All‑Natural, Allergen‑Friendly Seasonings | Billionaire BBQ, Everyday Beef & Zest & Herb Chicken Rubs – Perfect for Ribs, Burgers, Chicken, Brisket, Veggies & Meat Prep
short_description: TRIPLE SEASONING PACK FOR BBQ & MEAT LOVERS: Includes three bold, versatile seasonings — Billionaire BBQ, Everyday Beef, and Zest & Herb Chicken — giving you complete seasoning coverage for ribs, burgers, brisket, steak, chicken, veggies, and more. A one‑stop seasoning set for your grill.

CLEAN, ALL NATURAL & ALLERGEN‑MINDFUL: Formulated with real spices — like sea salt, garlic, onion, smoked paprika, brown sugar (in BBQ blend), herbs (parsley, thyme, rosemary), chile powder, black pepper, mustard, cumin, coriander — free from artificial fillers and junk.

SMOKY, SAVORY, SWEET & BALANCED FLAVORS: Billionaire BBQ brings smoky‑sweet richness, Everyday Beef adds savory depth and umami, Zest & Herb Chicken offers herbaceous brightness — together they cover a range from classic comfort to bold BBQ. Perfect for grilling, roasting, or seasoning meat.

VERSATILE FOR MEALS BIG & SMALL: Ideal for ribs, burgers, brisket, steaks, chicken, roasts, vegetables, grilled tofu — whether you’re cooking for a family dinner, a backyard barbecue, or meal prepping for the week. One bundle covers many dishes, reducing need for multiple separate spice jars.

PANTRY‑READY VALUE SET: A practical bundle to stock your pantry — long shelf life (common with dry spice blends), easy to store, and ready when you are. Great for everyday cooking, grilling seasons, meal prep or occasional feasts.

name: McCormick ONE Sheet Pan Farmer's Market Chicken & Vegetables Seasoning Mix, 1.25 oz (Pack of 12)
short_description: Convenient seasoning mix for easy weeknight meals
One pan meals = minimal clean-up
Comes together quickly
Classic flavors
Family-favorite
product_description: Highlight the best of the season’s produce with McCormick One Sheet Pan Farmer’s Market Chicken and Vegetables. This versatile seasoning mix plays well with whatever vegetables you have on hand, creating a simple, balanced and delicious meal in about 30 minutes with the added bonus of easy clean-up. In summer, prepare the seasoning mix with bell peppers and zucchini with chicken breast. For a heartier winter meal, you could substitute the chicken with pork and turn to Brussels sprouts and root vegetables such as carrots. The beauty of this mix is that it works well with a variety of ingredients, so as long as it’s in your pantry, you have dinner covered! To make this one-pan meal, you will need: McCormick ONE Seasoning Mix, oil, boneless chicken breasts or chicken thighs and assorted fresh vegetables.

short_description: AUTHENTIC MEXICAN FLAVOR MADE EASY - Transform your kitchen into a fiesta with our birria bomb balls! Each bomb infuses your meat with rich, slow-cooked Mexican flavors of chilies, herbs, and spices—all ready in a fraction of the usual time.

PERFECTLY SIZED FOR SHARING - Each bomb serves 5-7 people, making it ideal for family dinners, gatherings, or prepping multiple meals. Simply add water and meat, and enjoy authentic, gourmet flavors without any fuss—perfect for any occasion!

VERSATILE INGREDIENT - From tacos to burritos, nachos to quesadillas, the Birria Bomb enhances all your favorite dishes. It's your all-in-one secret ingredient for a variety of delicious Mexican meals, easily adapted for stovetop, slow cooker, or pressure cooker preparation.

HANDCRAFTED WITH QUALITY INGREDIENTS - Made with authentic, premium spices and herbs, our Birria Bomb Pack delivers a balanced, bold taste that won’t overpower. Enjoy the deep, comforting flavors of traditional Mexican birria, making restaurant-quality meals accessible to everyone.

FOR EVERY SKILL LEVEL - Designed for culinary beginners and experts alike, the Birria Bomb Pack is easy to use and guarantees restaurant-quality flavor at home. Impress your guests or family with a delicious meal they’ll rave about.
